snippet: An explosive device struck a police patrol in Cairo on Friday, fatally wounding one police officer and injuring nine others.
abstract: Egyptian police patrolling district in Cairo is hit by explosive device; one police officer dies and nine others are injured; Islamist militant group Ajnad Misr claims responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: An explosive device struck a police patrol in Cairo on Friday, fatally wounding one police officer and injuring nine others.

headline.main: Egypt: Explosion Kills a Police Officer
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Explosion Kills a Police Officer
